Non-SME Asset Listing Application

We are accepting applications on a rolling basis

The PULL call aims to attract and engage Europeans SMEs/midcaps to join and integrate existing Model-Based Design tools into the HUBCAP Collaboration Platform. However, there may be MBD tools developed by other organisations who are not eligible for PULL funding but would be a valuable addition to the platform and ecosystem.

In the spirit of openness, HUBCAP is accepting applications from organisations offering MBD tools who are not eligible for PULL funding.

Applications are subject to the same evaluation criteria as for PULL calls, to screen applications for appropriateness and quality. By filling in the form, it is not guaranteed that your asset will be listed.

Who are we looking for?

We are accepting applications from organisations in the following categories, with mature and well-supported MBD tools:

  • SMEs who are unable to apply to PULL calls due to reaching the maximum funding from the Smart Anything Everywhere or i4MS initiatives
  • Large Enterprises
  • Academic and research institutes

HUBCAP is looking for MBD tools that may be applied to a range of sectors (Mobility, Industry, Health, Energy, Environment, Robotics, etc.), to enrich our innovative and sustainable cloud-based open collaboration platform.

How does it work?

Once you have submitted the form, your application will be evaluated by project partners for suitability. If your application is accepted, you will be provided with credentials and be invited to integrate your tool into the Collaboration Platform. Support is available through workshops and one-to-one meetings if required.

What's in it for us?

  1. The opportunity to integrate your MBD tools into the HUBCAP Collaboration Platform
  2. The chance to reach potential new customers and collaborators
  3. Access to a sustainable ecosystem of stakeholders active in multiple CPS domains (Mobility, Industry, Health, Energy, Environment, Robotics, etc.)
  4. Access to workshops and connections with our DIHs

Have questions? Get in touch to find out more and an expert from one of our Digital Innovation Hubs will gladly answer any questions, provide advice and support you through the whole process.
